entry.title: Algorithm 1 reduce()
entry.summary: reduce(): the most useful algorithm in many programming languages Introduction In its essence, the computer program is a series of simple ideas put together to perform a complex process, and so we can refer to the computer program as the composition of abstract things called data, and some processes we perform over these things are called algorithms, in other words, ...
